I have the following T207's for sale.  Prices includes shipping.  Condition is VG to VGEX.  Scan don't hide flaws.  Paypal (gift), checks or money orders are fine.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].  Thanks!  Kevin

Robert Coulson - Brooklyn Dodgers - $30
Otis Crandall - New York Giants - $30
Bert Daniels - New York Yankees - $30
Robert Harmon - St. Louis Cardinals - $25
Clyde Milan - Washington Senators - $25
